attributes.action: Make Halloween and All Saints Day National Bank holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All Hallow's Eve and All Saints Days were traditional Church days.
Also, Halloween is turning into a National day for people to form together and have a good time. 
People decorate their houses and make a festive evening of it...
Surely this is a good thing for Britain - helping us to come together as one community?
